summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) on Long-Term Pick Substack by Dan. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AMAT. Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT)’s share was trading at $183.16 as of Dec 3rd. AMAT’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.27 and 18.87 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Applied Materials […]
